attributes.action: Don't Let the İllegal Entrance for Asylum Seekers To UK
attributes.additional_details:
We want All uk citizens To Sign this petition, We should pay Tax For every penny Working Without Tax And Tricking the government Is Not "GOOD" at all But as we said %60 Of the Asylum seekers comes uk for work ( From Economic Situations)
And We are sure about They have money to pay for Human traffickers, from Mid east It costs Around £15.000-20.000 Their Mind Like I will Pay £15.000-20.000 For Once and I will make that money When I Go to UK. So In this situation Most of them are not in danger...
attributes.background: As a Uk Citizen We find it's Guilty To Accept Illegal entrance for the asylum seekers. They are working Without permission, They don't Pay tax in Our's Beautiful Country, It's Not Fair, They should pay a Tax As we can see 60% Of the asylum seekers Comes Here For Work from Turkey,Syria,Iraq Mid East

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744
